name: SplashFly
description:
SplashFly is a fun arcady paper plane flight combat game

SplashFly is still in developpement!

If you like it, you can join the community, support it by going on SplashFly website!

Future for SplashFly hold:

- Multiplatform support (pc, VR headset, consoles, etc)

- Multiplayer split screen

- Online Multiplayer

- More weapons, bonuses, maps, skins, modes and customizability 

- And whatever I or the community would think about ^^
